roleset.name: lacking decisiveness

role.descr: hesitant to do, or about what?

roleset.note: Roleset based on instances in BOLT P01, parts 2,3. Framed by Claire.

example.name: Both args
example.text: Not to mention if they do default the [new Republican controlled House]-2 is going *-2 to be more hesitant to bail places like these out .
example.arg: to bail places like these out .
